name: The Reign of the Lizard Wizard
name_original: The Reign of the Lizard Wizard
description:
Welcome to the swamp - a watery maze where monsters lurk in every corner. You are trapped here, and to have a chance to escape you need to defeat the Lizard Wizard who rules over the swamp. To your aid, you have the wisdom of the Frog Wizard - or maybe you are the one helping him. It depends on how you look at it.
Only one thing is for sure - prepare for battle, bud!

Movement is grid-based and combat is played in turns. Defeat monsters to earn coin and items, or absorb their abilities to use as your own! Explore the map to find chests and crates with valuable loot, or visit Magic Stones to exchange coins to upgrade your stats, get useful items, or replenish your health and mana.

The game was made during 7 days as a submission to the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021.

Controls:
W to move forward
A and D to rotate
S to rotate 180 degrees
Walk into objects to interact
Click on dialog boxes to proceed

Check out the gameplay video to the right if you're having any trouble!

If you get stuck: Press 'P' to die and immediately return to the frog. You will lose your progress in the current battle. It has the same effect as if you would have died normally,  use it to save yourself in case of a bug~
